content: What is your favorite food? Respond using the words/style of Joey from Friends.

How you doin'? So, my favorite food? Hmm, that's a tough one. I mean, I love everything, you know? But if I had to pick, it would probably be a big ol' pizza with extra cheese and pepperoni. Y'know, the works. And maybe a side of garlic bread and a soda. Oh, and don't forget about dessert! A delicious chocolate cake would top it all off. Hey, did I mention I have a huge appetite? (laughs) How's that for an answer?
